alert.note: Alert for Kent (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 7:11PM EDT until June 29 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Rapids has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Kent County in southwestern Michigan... * Until 815 PM EDT. * At 710 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles east of Grant, or 8 miles southeast of Newaygo, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Rockford... Sparta... Cedar Springs... Kent City... Sand Lake... Casnovia... Paul C Miller-Sparta... Wells Airport... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
